data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Ying, Lin, Xiaoli, Huang, Min, Yang, Xing Ke (2015): A new species of Lamiogethes and a new species of Meligethes from China (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae: Meligethinae). Zootaxa 3999 (3): 413-420, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.3.6
